price: Por certo, os que crêem e fazem boas obras terão os Jardins de Al-Firdaus, por hospedagem;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti kānat lahum jannātu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
